content.rendered:
Directed by Midhun Manuel Thomas

Written by Rajendra Sapre

Cast Kunchacko Boban (Anwar Hussain). Jinu Joseph (Anil Madhavan). Unnimaya Prasad (Catherine Maria). Sreenath Bhasi (Andrew). Abhiram Radhakrishnan (Pradeep Raman). Harikrishnan (Arun Mathew). Sharafudheen (Dr. Benjamin Louis). Divya Gopinath (Preethi Poduval). Indrans (Ripper Ravi). Ramya Nambeeshan (Fathima). Arun (Fr. Bennett Franco). Nikhila Vimal (Rebecca Lewis). Jaffer Idukki (Louis). Mathew Thomas (Benjamin Louis (Teen)). Nandana Varma (Rebecca (Teen)). Jaise Jose (Sharath Chandran). Assim Jamal (Hashim). Gilu Joseph (Doctor). Paul D. Joseph (Police Constable). Shaju K.S.(Paulson). Santhosh Laxman (Bengali Worker). Majeed (Minister (as Abdul Majeed)). Dileesh Nair (Cocaine Shameer). Arjun Nandakumar (Prakash Sitaram). Amina Nijam (Vicky Maria). Rajan Pootharakkal (Mad Man). Preman (Police Constable). Priyanandanan (Sudhakar Devalokam). Sadiq (Dr. Sreekanth). Boban Samuel (Abraham Koshy). Shins (Jail Police Officer). Siyona (Samskrithi). Sudheesh (Sudevan). Vineeth Vasudevan (Cop)

Languages Malayalam

Production Ashiq Usman Production. Manual Movie Maker. Goldmines Telefilm
